data.message: FB has allowed me to reconnect w/ a good deal of the girls I went to H.S. with. I use it like a diary of what s happening in our lives.  I m a FB junkie!!!!

replies.message: We're glad Facebook has helped you reconnect with some of your high school friends, Mary-Suzanne! -Sarah

I have a sister name Judy bumper I love her as my sister but she called herself mad I really don't know if so what for one thing about our relationship i don't have to beg anyone of daddy children to be a sister to me i were there and your mom were there for me and I love her for that so whatever Judy baby is mad about get over it because I don't care.
